function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reliance on anecdotal reporting for increase in intimate partner violence (IPV) during the pandemic","Impact":"Misleading analysis of the actual increase in IPV","Mitigation":"Use of reliable statistical and longitudinal data to analyze the trend in IPV","Technologies":"Statistical analysis tools, data visualization software","People":"Victims of IPV, researchers, policymakers","Owner":"Researchers, government agencies"},{"Description":"Failure to provide unbiased estimates of the rise in intimate partner violence (IPV)","Impact":"Inaccurate understanding of the extent of the problem, leading to ineffective policies","Mitigation":"Use of multiple methodologies and longitudinal data for comparison","Technologies":"Data analytics tools, longitudinal data analysis software","People":"Researchers, policymakers","Owner":"Research institutes, government agencies"},{"Description":"Potential seasonal increases in intimate partner violence (IPV) complicating the analysis","Impact":"Inaccurate attributions of increase in IPV to pandemic-related policies","Mitigation":"Accounting for seasonal variations in IPV trends in the analysis","Technologies":"Seasonal adjustment models, time series analysis tools","People":"Researchers, policymakers","Owner":"Research institutes, government agencies"}]}
